Title: swift commander - quick overview
Description:
swift commander is the easiest tool if you want to manage your files in openstack swift cloud storage (or rackspace or HP clouds.)

This 2 minutes video shows you how to upload data to swift, check that source and destination are identical in size, navigate through directories, read a file, download a folder and delete a folder.

Swift Commander is available on Github
https://github.com/FredHutch/swift-commander
